Package org.toolboxframework.scan

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ToolScanner
    The ToolScanner class contains methods to scan classes and packages for tools.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AnnotatedClassNotConcreteNonEnumTypeException
    This exception is raised if a class annotated with Tool or ToolMaker is either an enum or not a concrete class.
    CircularDependencyException
    This exception is raised if a circular dependency is discovered between tools during the scanning process.
    DuplicateToolNameException
    This exception is raised if two tools that would be built during a scan have the same name.
    MethodAnnotatedWithToolReturnsVoidException
    This exception is raised if a method annotated with Tool has a return type of void.
    MissingDefaultConstructorException
    This exception is raised if a class annotated with Tool or ToolMaker does not have a default constructor.
    ReflectionException
    This exception is raised if any problems come up while invoking the Java reflection API during a scan.
    ToolScannerException
    This is the abstract super class from which all exceptions that could be thrown during a scan inherit.
    ToolScannerIOException
    This exception is raised if an IO exception occurs during a scan.
    UnableToBuildToolException
    This exception is raised if an exception occurs during the construction of a tool during a scan.
